title: Gorky 17 / Odium [PC] [ENGLISH] [GOG]
description:
INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS


Just Install & Play!


IMPORTANT NOTE!


 This game seems to have some video card/driver compatibility issues, and depending on what graphic engine you will choose the first time you try to run the game, it might freeze your PC. If that happens reboot your computer and select another 3D option before running the game, like "Software Rendering". If that doesn't work your only option might be to try an older driver for your graphics card.


Enjoy & Please Seed!
